articles.description: In a new documentary about gender ideology that will air tomorrow night, the anonymous teammates said they were told never to question Lia's place and that doing so sealed their fate.
articles.content:
Lia Thomas' teammates say UPenn protected the transgender swimmer so enthusiastically because she helped them win points over other schools - then warned them they'd be canceled if they spoke out.
